timeline.message: refactor(sonar): Reduced cognitive complexity by moving Gradle execution code to its own class.
refactor(sonar): Reduced cognitive complexity by moving logic chunks into methods.
refactor(sonar): Reduced cognitive complexity by moving filtering to Stream operations.
refactor(sonar): Reduced cognitive complexity by exiting method early.
refactor(sonar): Reduced cognitive complexity by moving logic chunks into methods.
refactor(sonar): Reduced cognitive complexity by moving logic chunks into methods.
refactor(sonar): Reduced cognitive complexity by simplifying if statements.
refactor(sonar): Reduced cognitive complexity by removing unnecessary if checks.
refactor(sonar): Reduced cognitive complexity by moving logic chunks into methods.
fix(product-boot): Fixing bug introduced by sonar refactor.
fix(sonar): Fixing compilation errors introduced by sonar refactor.
refactor(sonar): Reduced cognitive complexity by moving logic chunks into methods and utilizing Streams.

timeline.bodyText: did these changes for runBlackDuckProduct reduce the complexity enough?
timeline.author: crowleySynopsys

replies.bodyText: Not the final removals. I did slightly restructure one method. There were multiple cognitive complexity issues in this file. I am only addressing one of them here. Not quite sure how I want to tackle this file going forward.
replies.author: JakeMathews
